case.title: Essential skills - Peg transfer
case.shortDescription: Transfer the triangles mid air from the left side to the right side and back again.
case.detailedDescription: Using graspers, pick up a triangle from a peg on the left side with your left hand and transfer in mid air to your right hand and place down on a right side peg. Repeat for all triangles. Once all triangles are on the right side, repeat the whole process but from right to left. If you drop a triangle, pick it back up using the last hand that was holding it.

selfAssessmentImages.tip: Next time you can work on using your grasping hand to apply tension on the gauze for better cutting.
Nice job. Keep on practicing to improve your accuracy
Next time you can work on using your grasping hand to apply tension on the gauze for better cutting.

selfAssessment.tip: Itâ€™s ok to switch hands to complete the exercise, but your overall speed will be affected.

time.tip: To help improve accuracy and efficiency, develop a consistent (clockwise) pattern and work both hands simultaneously.

task1: Your objective is to pass the triangles in midair from the left side to the right and back in as little time as possible without dropping the triangle out of view.
